FuncDef: The display dhcp relay address command displays DHCP configurations of all relay interfaces.
CLIs: display dhcp relay address { all | interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of a DHCP relay interface.
-

Examples: Dhcp Option          Relay Agent IP       Server IP
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Run the display dhcp relay address command to check the following DHCP configuration on relay interfaces:
DHCP server addressAssociation between a DHCP option and a DHCP server addressAssociation between a DHCP option a DHCP relay agent address

Prerequisites
DHCP relay has been enabled using the dhcp select relay command in the interface view.A DHCP server address or DHCP option has been specified using the ip relay address command.
